I am a first-year PhD student at École Normale Supérieure de Lyon, under the supervision of Elisa Riccietti, Paulo Gonçalves, and Nelly Pustelnik. I am a member of the OCKHAM Inria team of the LIP laboratory.

Research interests

I am interested in inverse problems, multilevel optimization, and machine learning.
